nodes.text: Asyrphus was a terrestrial astronomical object where the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry were deployed at some point between 0 BBY and 3 ABY. On Asyrphus, the company faced a bombardment which massacred many of its troopers, including a comm tech and her droid. Hazram Namir, a soldier in the 61st who knew the technician, remembered the massacre on Asyrphus in his mind when recalling her in 3 ABY, and later that year when he compared the losses the 61st took on Asyrphus to the company's recent losses in its command structure.
Asyrphus was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
